reviewText: We all like to think that the life of a fashion designer is sexy and full of excitement.  If any of that is true, one would not be convinced of this based on this portrayal of Christian Dior.  Aside from a short period of illness, it would appear that he faced no obstacles.  Not sure he came from money, but it does sound like he had considerable privilege and got pretty much whatever he wanted.  There is also little discussion of his personal life.  On weekends, he retreated to his vacation home and drew there.  He then headed back into the city weekdays to work.  Exciting, right?  (I kind of wish I had never watched it -- because I was better off thinking of him as the struggling and angst-ridden artist.  That, . . . he was not.)
summary: I really hope Dior wasn't this boring
Title: Christian Dior, the Man behind the Myth

reviewText: It is just a little icing on a very big cake. If you know nothing of Dior then it's good. Sadly it begins with the funeral and ends with the funeral. A good summary for the novice.
summary: It is just a little icing on a very big cake.
Title: Christian Dior, the Man behind the Myth

reviewText: I must admit I enjoyed all 52. I enjoyed the information given about the designer and of course, the garments! As a matter of fact, I watched more than once.
Title: Christian Dior, the Man behind the Myth

reviewText: Rare black and white footage of Christian Dior in his atelier at work as well as interviews with designers he inspired. A great addition to fashion lovers and history buffs collection.
summary: Christian Dior:: The Man Behind the Myth
Title: Christian Dior, the Man behind the Myth

reviewText: Although the subject matter is fascinating, the film comes across like the ones we used to watch in the library in high school.  The narrator could easily be from a random old National Geographic film about mating whales.  It's ok for historical content, but not very interesting.
summary: Very dry, like something from high school.
Title: Christian Dior, the Man behind the Myth
